name: Salomon Vitane Plus Prolink Boots - Women's
description: For long days of Nordic touring, the Vitane Plus Prolink boot offers a customizable fit with the added warmth of Thinsulate. These boots are generously sized for all day comfort, with a semi-rigid cuff to balance support with flexibility.Women's specific fit with narrower heel and lower instep volume.Custom fit liner with Thinsulate® insulation.Sanitized anti-bacterial treatment keeps inners odour-free.Quick-lace speed lacing system with zip-up lace covers.Ergonomic flexible cuff has Velcro® strap for a secure fit.Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width.Classic flex pattern is designed for good forefoot flex, with stiffer rear flex to add torsional rigidity.Prolink soles are NNN compatible and provide a low profile boot-binding connection for exceptional snow feel.
